note.p: Birth: Drogheda, County Louth, Ireland (27 September 1775)
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. MA (1801), BD (1821), DD (1821)

Career: Ordained deacon (1799); Curate, Swanlinbar, County Cavan; Curate, Magorbane, County Tipperary ; Archdeacon of Emyly (1820); Bishop of Limerick, Arfert and Agadhoe (1822); became paralysed and left Ireland (1827); wrote religious works
